summary: This is an email from a Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney for the SDNY, forwarding a news article link about a hearing related to Jeffrey Epstein that took place on June 24, 2019. The email highlights media coverage of the legal proceedings.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the hearing referenced in the forwarded news article. The document is about a legal proceeding concerning him.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: A hearing related to Jeffrey Epstein's case was held, as reported by the Miami Herald. The email forwards a link to this news coverage.

keyFacts: An email was sent on June 25, 2019, regarding a hearing for Jeffrey Epstein that occurred the previous day (June 24, 2019).
The email originated from a Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
The email contains a link to a Miami Herald article covering the hearing, indicating official monitoring of media reports on the case.
